oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elizabeth Buchanan Bradley
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kyle, Reuben, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Candid photo of Elizabeth Buchanan Bradley, sister of James McGill Buchanan and former director of the Campus School associated with MTSU. The photo was taken in the Virginia home of James Buchanan.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Middle Tennessee State University Campus School; Laboratory schools
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Reproductions allowed only with written permission of the photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
